description.full: Single Player, HD (High Definition). Wasn't that cool? Well, it gets even cooler. Purchase the full version of RoboBlitz™ and you'll get even more weapons, more baddies, and more of that juicy physics magic you just can't get anywhere else on Xbox Live® Arcade. See if you can score the full billion points. Buy RoboBlitz today! There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
description.short: RoboBlitz™ is a humorous, physics-based action game full of inventive gizmos, weapons, and environments. Players take on the role of Blitz, a multitalented robot who must activate an aging Space Cannon in order to save his world from a band of maladjusted space pirates. RoboBlitz  features 19 levels of puzzle solving and high-intensity action, powered by the Unreal® Engine™ 3.
